title: DEDUCTION COLLEGE QQQ
description: If the answers Logico needed were in the past, he was going to have to hit the books. So he went to his old alma mater, the College of Deduction, to do some research. But someone was trying to stop him. Either that or the librarian was killed for unrelated reasons.

suspects.name: DEAN GLAUCOUS
suspects.description: The dean of some such and such department at Deduction College. What does he do? Well, he handles the money, for one...

suspects.name: MISTER SHADOW
suspects.description: A silhouette in shadow. He moves like the wind and he looks like the night.

suspects.name: CHANCELLOR TUSCANY
suspects.description: As the head of Deduction College, she has deduced the best way to prevent herself from being killed by a rival. (Kill them first.)

suspects.name: MISS SAFFRON
suspects.description: Gorgeous and stunning, but maybe not all there in the brains department. Or maybe that's what she wants you to think. Or maybe she wants you to think that's what she wants you to think.

weapons.name: A CRYSTAL SKULL
weapons.description: Maybe an actual alien's skull or maybe just a hoax.

weapons.name: A GRADUATION CORD
weapons.description: It would be an honor to be strangled by one of these.

weapons.name: A SHARP PENCIL
weapons.description: Back then, they used actual lead. One stab and you'd die from lead poisoning.

weapons.name: A HEAVY BACKPACK
weapons.description: Finally, a use for all of those logic textbooks.

locations.name: THE BOOKSTORE
locations.description: The biggest moneymaker on campus. A sign offers a deal on textbooks, three for $750.

locations.name: OLD MAIN
locations.description: The first building on campus, the most important, and the least maintained. Paint is peeling off the walls!

locations.name: THE STADIUM
locations.description: The field features the absolute highest-quality fake grass money can buy.

locations.name: THE ARBORETUM
locations.description: An arboretum in the middle of campus. They've got oak, pine—all the trees!

clues: The person who wanted to create a diversion was in the stadium.
Mister Shadow did not want to kill for the greater good.
A Virgo was looking at a pine tree. It was pretty.
In the labyrinth engraved on the ancient ruins, chamber 1 is connected with the chamber bearing the second letter of the last name of the suspect in the bookstore. (See Exhibit C.)
Logico found a shard of a crystal in Old Main.
Whoever wanted to prove a point was right-handed.
A graduation cord was seen lying on the ground outdoors.
Miss Saffron was seen with a sharp pencil—maybe she is smart!
A heavy backpack was found beside the librarian.
